node.title: Woman dies after car swept into suburban creek in Brisbane's north
node.alt: A white sedan in a narro creek surrounded by brown flodowaters.
node.description: A 44-year-old woman dies after the car she was a passenger in was swept into a creek in Aspley.Â
node.content:
["A woman has died in floodwater\u00a0in Brisbane's north during a severe storm.\u00a0", "Police said emergency services received reports a car had been swept into a creek at Aspley, about 8pm last night.", "The driver, a 52 year-old man, was found alive a short time later but the vehicle\u00a0and his 44 year-old passenger were missing.", "It took police about three hours to locate the submerged sedan, with the body of the woman inside.", "The Forensic Crash Unit is investigating.", "It is the fourth flood-related death in Queensland in three weeks.\u00a0", "", "
It took emergency services hours to locate the car, which was swept into Little Cabbage Tree Creek.(ABC News: Michael Rennie)
", "Brisbane, Logan and the Gold Coast were hit by severe storms overnight, with heavy rainfall in some areas.", "North of Brisbane, Samford\u00a0recorded 61 millimetres of rain\u00a0in half an hour.", "Deception Bay, north of Brisbane, has clocked up 114 millimetres of rain since 9am yesterday.\u00a0", "As the storms swept over southern Queensland in the afternoon,\u00a0golf-ball-sized hail pummelled the southern border town of Goondiwindi.", "Bureau of Meteorology forecaster Ricus Lombard said the storm cells delivered significant rain.", "\"The best rainfall was probably from around Samford towards the north, sort of Strathpine, up towards the Redcliffe Peninsula,\" Mr Lombard said.", "\"We saw rainfall getting up to around the 60-70mm\u00a0in an hour, with a lot of that falling within 30 minutes.\"", "Mr Lombard said further severe storms were possible further north throughout the day, before the skies fine up tomorrow.", "\"We still have a risk of some showers and storms,\u00a0the main focus probably a little bit further north,\u00a0towards the Sunshine Coast and through the Wide Bay and Central Coast, through Capricornia there.", "\"Temperatures still stay warm, so remaining probably a little bit humid as well.\""]
